body.name: Kid Safe In-Drawer Bamboo Sharp Knives Holder & Organizer. (Knives Not Included). Multi Purpose Lock Box. Only 5.5 Inches Wide. Holds up tp 25 Knives. Best Knife Block Alternative!
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 6 hrs 4 mins
features: KEEP YOUR KNIVES ORGANIZED & SAFE : Keep sharp knives safe & Organized. No more worries of kids accessing dangerous knives. Safely storage items like, scissors, batteries, glue, medication, etc. Combination and key lock is included!
SAVE DRAWER SPACE: Use this box as a much safer and practical alternative to other knife blocks. While only 5.5 Inches wide it can still hold up to 25 steak knives!
REMOVABLE KNIFE BLOCKS: Four knife blocks are included, and can be stationed anywhere in the box for your convenience. Use Velcro to attach box to drawer. Velcro Included.
CLEAN COUNTER SPACE: Keep counters clean and knives away from curious hands.

ECO FRIENDLY, NO TREE CUT, DURABLE BAMBOO: The box and dividers are entirely made of 100% Natural Bamboo. Bamboo is one of the most renewable resources in the world, with a tensile strength even stronger than steel. Bamboo is a grass and absorbs up to 5 times as much carbon dioxide, produces up to 35% more oxygen, and grows up to 5 times faster than trees. A far better choice than wood!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Combo is set at 000
reviews.reviewText: When I received this box, everything (including the directions) was locked inside. Fortunately, I was able to guess the combination (000) and open it. Other than the initial confusion, I am very happy with this box. All of my knives fit inside. My biggest knife is 14" long and 2" wide, and it had no problem. If you have a lot of knives with thick handles, you may have difficulty fitting them all. The box comes with the combination lock installed, and the combination is easy to set to whatever you want. The lock works smoothly so far, but I just got it, so I don't know how it will hold up over time. The box looks nice, and seems well made. I am surprised that I couldn't find many products available to lock up knives, since I imagine we aren't the only family with a need to keep knives away from members with mental health struggles. Ideally, I would have liked a box with a fingerprint lock for quick access while cooking. The orientation of the combination is awkward, and would be difficult to enter the combination while the box is in a drawer, since you have to look at it from the side. I intend to keep it on my counter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice little safety box
reviews.reviewText: Knives all fit, not pretty but was able to get 8 different sized knives in there and keep them locked. This isn't a safe and could be easily broken into, but the point is to take away immediate access to sharp knives. This box accomplishes that goal plus looks nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works pretty well
reviews.reviewText: We needed to keep our knives locked up and it was hard to find something that would work for us. This works pretty well. Not so great for short paring knives, and can't fit our larger knives in it, but there's only so much space in it anyway. It works well for all the basic longer knives.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does it's job well and looks good
reviews.reviewText: Thanks to this, wandering hands won't find our knives yet they're easily within reach for us. The box is extremely light and seems well made. However the walls of the box are really thin which makes them seem less durable. Locking and unlocking are easy enough, though the knives have to be arranged such that they're not in the way of the locking mechanism. Overall, the box works as advertised without issues. I'm so happy with the purchase that I purchased another!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Does it's job
reviews.reviewText: It's very flimsy and I'm pretty sure if tried it would be very easy to busy into. Not recommended for anyone who needs to seriously lock up knives.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Customer Service
reviews.reviewText: Nice box. Had trouble getting into at first but contacted customer service and they offered to replace the lock for free. It ended up not being necessary but I was impressed they offered. Box fits in my knife drawer nicely and lock feels secure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Looks nice, box could be bigger and lock is horrible
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because I prefer good knives and have a toddler. I’ve had it for roughly 6 months total. Once I put most of my knives in it (a few wouldn’t fit because they were too tall or long), I started using it but the locking mechanism became a pain to use. All but one of my knives are currently in the box and the lock won’t work, the reset button isn’t working on the lock so it seems like. So now I may have to throw them all out or just break the box and leave them in the open. Waste of money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well-built and holds all my steak knives
reviews.reviewText: This is a nicely made storage box. It holds all my steak knives correctly with a little room to spare. I'm not using the locking devices but like that you can have key or combination access. It also included a small sharpener that fits in the box. This is a good value.
